name: Sales Page Addon – Elementor & Beaver Builder
author: NicheAddons

sections.description:
Generate more leads for your landing page with this Sales Page Addon. Yes, get ready to boost all your businesses and increase your profits. This Sales Page Addon gives you a landing page, which is well optimized for performance, and sales page friendly design most importantly, just a single click is more than enough to import our Sales Page Addon Templates.

The Sales Page Addon Plugin was built in a way that it helps you to get the best and easy to edit long landing pages with proven industry standards of A/B testing elements. Whatever maybe your product, either it may be a Digital or Physical or Services this Sales Page Addon will be the perfect one.

Ever Growing Template Library

FREE

  • Financial Advisor – Consulting
  • Herbal Skin Care – Physical Product
  • Online Coding – Course
  • Social Media – Course
  • Gym – Physical Product
  • Art/Drawing – Course
  • SEO Marketing – Consulting, Course
  • Stock Broker – Investment
  • E-Book
  • Webinar

PRO

  • Art/Drawing – Course
  • Social Media – Course
  • Online Coding – Course
  • SEO Marketing – Consulting, Course
  • Yoga – Instructor
  • Financial Advisor – Consulting
  • Gym – Physical Product
  • Herbal Skin Care – Physical Product
  • Construction – Enquiry
  • Psycho Doctor – Enquiry
  • Crypto – Investment
  • Stock Broker – Investment
  • Web Design – Agency
  • More Coming Soon…

The Best-Ever Features Are

  • One-Click Import:
    Just a Click is more than enough to get a best industry standard design template in less than a minute.

  • Page Builder Support:
    Sales Page Addon Works well in Elementor & Beaver Page Builders.

  • Multiple Products Landing Pages in Single Website:
    Wanna sell multiple products on your website. It is possible with our addon too. Yes, with our addon you can create a single landing page for your every single product.

  • A/B Tested Industry Standard Templates:
    After several researches, this plugin underwent different testings to have a perfect Landing page with high conversion.

  • Ever Growing Template Library
    We’re continously adding new tempaltes for a new and most-wanted category businesses.

  • Fully Responsive
    Whatever may be the device this template will fit perfectly on all of them.

  • Fast Loading Templates
    With our Sales Page Addon you can have a faster loading speed templates, Google loves optimized websites!!!

  • Your Customers in your Own Control
    Everything is between you and your customers, no other intermediate. You have complete control over the costumes informations.

Why is the Sales Page Addon the Best

  • NO Complications:
    Only a single click is more than enough to build a high quality and well tested landing page. Completely easy to handle and generate high results.

  • Applied High Conversion Test Results:
    Sales Page Addon was developed after performing all the research and testing. So you can save your time and get a high conversion rate.

  • Complete Control:
    You have complete control over the costumes informations. Not like some other pages where you only get less customer infos.

The Sales Page Addon is Suitable for?

✔ Online Teachers
✔ Instructors / Coaches / Trainers
✔ Course Creators
✔ Product/Service Businesses
✔ Agencies
✔ Personal Brands
✔ Doctors
✔ Startups
✔ Real Estate
✔ Artists
✔ Consultants
✔ Advisors
✔ Investors
✔ All Common Product Selling Businesses
sections.installation:
• Make sure you already have a WordPress site and the Elementor plugin installed and activated.

Default Installation

  1. Install “Sales Page Addon” via WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Once installed, Activate “Sales Page Addon”

Manual Installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does Sales Page Addon work with my theme?

Sales page addon was built for all well developed WordPress Themes. In case of any issues our support team is always available for you to rectify your issues.

Does Sales Page Addon work with my page builder?

Sales Page Addon Works well in Elementor & Beaver Page Builders.

Does Sales Page Addon work with my payment gateway?

Yes, whatever may be your payment gateway Sales Page Addon will work perfectly. All you need to do is just add the payment gateway link to the Button.

Is there a Pro version of Sales Page Addon?

Yes, it is a complete option, but it comes with features like Premium Templates, Multi-Page Builders Support and Many More.
